Goal Representation: ['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Iron the shirt.']

behavior wash_a_shirt(shirt: item, sink: item):
    body:
        achieve_once inside(shirt, sink) # Ensure the shirt is placed inside the sink
        wash_shirt(shirt, sink) # Call the behavior to wash the shirt in the sink

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and dirty(shirt)
        # Select a dirty shirt

        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        # Select a sink

        wash_a_shirt(shirt, sink)
        # Wash the selected shirt in the sink
